citations.narrative:
An approximately 2’x3’ area of exposed chain link wire on the floor of one corner of the enclosure housing 3 African
crested porcupines is observed. Exposed chain link in the floor of an enclosure housing animals that are heavy diggers
poses a foot entrapment risk. The regulations state that the indoor and outdoor housing facilities shall be structurally
sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury and to contain the animals. Correct by
23May2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
An approximately 2’x3’ area of exposed chain link wire on the floor of one corner of the enclosure housing 3 African 
crested porcupines is observed. Exposed chain link in the floor of an enclosure housing animals that are heavy diggers 
poses a foot entrapment risk. The regulations state that the indoor and outdoor housing facilities shall be structurally 
sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury and to contain the animals. Correct by 
23May2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
